detail_desc: Fitted, knee-length dress in soft jersey with short, flounced sleeves, a slightly wider neckline and horizontal straps at the back. Gathers in the sides for best fit over the tummy.

Push-up bra in microfibre and mesh with underwired, moulded, padded cups for a larger bust and fuller cleavage. Narrow, adjustable shoulder straps and a narrow fastening at the back with two pairs of hooks and eyes.
Tights in a soft, fine-knit cotton blend with an elasticated waist.

Short, A-line dress in an airy weave with a deep V-neck, gathered, asymmetric seams for added width and long raglan balloon sleeves with narrow elastication at the cuffs. Jersey lining made from recycled polyester.
Treggings in superstretch twill with an elasticated waist, fake pockets at the front and real pockets at the back.
High-waisted jeans in washed superstretch denim with a zip fly and button, fake front pockets, real back pockets and super-skinny legs.

Sleeveless dress in tulle with frill trims on the shoulders and frill trims decorated with shimmering sequins and glittery appliqués around the neckline and down the front. Concealed press-studs at the back, a seam at the waist and a very wide, fluffy skirt in two layers of tulle. Lined.
Metal rings in various sizes and designs that can be worn on both the upper and lower part of the finger.
Leggings in washed, patterned stretch denim with an elasticated waist, fake fly and fake front pockets.
Satin-covered Alice band with padded horns.
Hair accessory made from thin metal chains with arrow-shaped pendants. Adjustable fastening.
Short, smocked, off-the-shoulder top in cotton jersey with short sleeves and overlocked edges.
Dress in soft organic cotton jersey with a gathered seam at the waist, gently flared skirt and short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups. Unlined.

Blouse in an airy weave with a small stand-up collar, V-neck, button placket and open chest pocket. Gathered yoke at the back, gathered shoulder seams, long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Checked shirt in soft cotton flannel in a relaxed fit with dropped shoulders and ripped-off sleeves. Collar, flap chest pockets with a button, and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.

Puffer jacket in a padded weave with a detachable hood, stand-up collar and zip down the front with a chin guard. Concealed elastication at the cuffs and hem. Lined. The polyester content of the jacket is recycled.
Fully lined swimsuit with an all-over print, narrow shoulder straps and gathers at the top.
Fitted nursing dress in cotton-blend jersey with short sleeves and a practical inner top for easier nursing access. The cotton content of the dress is organic.
Shorts in a patterned weave with a high, elasticated waist.
Fitted dress in sturdy jersey with lace details in a narrow cut at the top with a deep neckline and cut-out section at the back. Unlined.
Lightweight, unlined sports socks in fast-drying functional fabric with a ribbed shaft.

CONSCIOUS EXCLUSIVE. Slightly shorter, boxy-style blouse in textured poplin made from recycled cotton. Opening at the back with narrow ties at the back of the neck, dropped shoulders and voluminous, gathered balloon sleeves. Seam at the hem with a double-layered, flared peplum.
Top in jersey crêpe with draping. Wrapover front with a deep V-neck, long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a seam at the hem.
Leg warmers in a soft rib knit containing glittery threads with roll edges.
Cardigan in soft, fine-knit cotton with a V-neck, buttons down the front and patch front pockets. Ribbing down the button band and around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Boots in imitation leather with welt seams around the soles, lacing at the front, a zip in one side and a loop at the back. Fabric linings and insoles and fluted soles.
Jersey off-the-shoulder dress with elastication at the top and short, wide sleeves.
Espadrilles with a braided jute trim around the sole. Cotton twill linings and insoles and rubber soles.
Boxy-style jumper in a soft, fine knit containing some wool with low dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. The polyester content of the jumper is recycled.
Soft, organic cotton jersey shorts in various designs.
Short coat in printed faux fur with a large collar, wide sleeves, a diagonal fastening with concealed hook-and-eye fasteners at the front, and front pockets. Unlined.
Linen-blend jacket in a herringbone weave with notch lapels, a covered button at the front, welt front pockets with a flap, and decorative buttons at the cuffs. Lined.
Long-sleeved, soft cotton jersey tops in various designs.
Wide metal rings in various designs.
Trousers in soft, narrow-wale cotton corduroy with adjustable elastication and a drawstring at the waist and a fake fly with decorative buttons. Jersey lining.
Hoop earrings in metal and plastic. Three pairs in a solid colour and one patterned pair. Diameter 1.7 cm.
5-pocket trousers in stretch cotton velvet with a regular waist, zip fly and button, and slim legs.
Ankle boots in suede with loops at the sides. Fabric linings and insoles and rubber soles. Heel 2 cm.
Fully-fashioned trainers with elastication around the opening, lacing at the front and a loop at the back. Mesh insoles and imitation suede heel caps.

Top in woven fabric with wrapover straps at the front that tie at the back of the neck, an open back and a concealed zip in one side. Seam under the bust and a flared lower section that is slightly longer at the back. Unlined.
Top in a crêpe weave with a V-neck and short cap sleeves. Seam at the waist with narrow elastication at the back and a gently flared peplum.
Hat in woven fabric with pile sections, earflaps, and a tab with a hook and loop fastening under the chin. Fleece lining.
Boots with a decorative welt seam around the soles, padding around the top of the shaft and lacing at the front. Canvas linings and insoles and chunky rubber soles. Heel 3.5 cm.
Knee-length skirt in a crêpe weave with a concealed zip at the back and asymmetric hem with an overlocked edge. Unlined.
Watch in stainless steel with an adjustable leather strap and metal buckle. Width of strap approx. 2 cm, total length 23 cm. Diameter of watch 3.6 cm.
Fitted, long-sleeved top in soft, ribbed jersey with a V-neck and buttons at the top.

Short shorts woven in a pattern-weave linen blend with a high, elasticated paper bag waist, detachable tie belt and concealed zip fly. Pleats at the top, side pockets and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.
Shirt in a viscose weave with a collar and buttons down the front. Flap chest pockets, long sleeves with a tab and button, and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.

V-neck blouse in a lightly crêped viscose weave with buttons down the front, a yoke and gentle gathers at the shoulders. Long sleeves with gathered cuffs and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Biker jacket in imitation suede with a soft pile inside, collar and diagonal zip down the front. Zipped side pockets and a zip at the cuffs.

Fitted, padded jacket in woven fabric with a zip down the front and lined hood with a detachable faux fur trim. Elasticated drawstring at the waist, front pockets with a press-stud, and inner ribbing at the cuffs. Lined.
Short, straight-cut dress in a crêpe weave with an opening and covered button at the back of the neck and long puff sleeves with buttoned cuffs. Unlined.
3/4-length sports tights in fast-drying functional fabric with an elasticated waist.
Long-sleeved bodysuit, a pair of trousers and accessory in soft organic cotton jersey. Bodysuit with press-studs at the crotch. Trousers with wide foldover ribbing at the waist.
Jacket in woven fabric with a stand-up collar and detachable hood with an elasticated edge. Zip down the front, elasticated cuffs and elastication at the hem. Lined.
Straight-cut dress in a cotton weave with a collar, yoke with a pleat at the back and buttons down the front. Pockets in the side seams and wide, 3/4-length sleeves with buttoned cuffs. Unlined.
Sleeveless, calf-length dress in lace with chiffon appliqués, a V-neck and narrow, adjustable shoulder straps. Gathered seam at the waist, zip at the back and a gently flared skirt. Jersey lining.
Cardigan in sweatshirt fabric with a small, ribbed, small stand-up collar, zip with a chin guard at the front, welt side pockets and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Gloves in a fine-knit weave with foldover ribbing. Fleece lining.
Off-the-shoulder jumper in a soft, fine knit containing some wool with a wide foldover top, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Mesh top with narrow shoulder straps, smocking at the waist, a gentle flare to the hem and raw edges. Jersey lining.
Shirt in a softly draping viscose weave with a collar, buttons down the front, low dropped shoulders and cap sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups. One open chest pocket, and short slits in the sides.

Warm-lined, waterproof hi-tops in mesh and imitation leather. Padded top edge, a hook and loop tab at the top, elasticated lacing at the front and a loop at the back. Pile linings and insoles and patterned soles. The trainers have a water-repellent coating without fluorocarbons.
All-in-one suit in soft organic cotton jersey with a collar, sewn-on bow tie and decorative braces on the front. Press-studs down the front and legs, and full feet with elasticated heels.

Full-length, V-neck dress in heavily draping jersey with a slight sheen. Long shoulder straps that can be tied in various ways, elastication at the back of the waist and a raw-edge hem. Jersey lining.
A-line dress in lace with a round neckline and short cap sleeves. Opening with a pearly button at the back of the neck, and a scalloped hem. Lined.
Pyjamas in soft, printed cotton jersey. Long-sleeved top with ribbing around the neckline and cuffs. Bottoms with an elasticated waist and ribbed hems.
Hat in a soft, garter-stitched cotton blend with small knitted ears on top.
Rain jacket in water-repellent functional fabric with a drawstring hood, press-studs down the front, flap front pockets with a press-stud and long raglan sleeves. Unlined.
Double-layered hat in a fine knit with reversible sequins on the front.
Shorts in soft cotton denim with broderie anglaise. Covered elastication and a drawstring at the waist, a fake fly, side and back pockets, and scalloped hems.
Pyjamas in satin with contrasting colour piping. Long-sleeved shirt with a resort collar and buttons down the front. Straight, wide bottoms with an elasticated waist.

Ankle-length cigarette trousers in stretch twill made from a cotton blend with elastication at the back of the waist, fake back pockets and tapered legs with creases. Wide panel at the waist for best fit over the tummy.
Fully lined bikini bottoms with a low waist and ties at the sides.
Metal and plastic hair clips in various designs. One with sparkly glass stones, one with pearly plastic beads, one in patterned plastic and one with large beads in various colours. Length 6.5-7 cm.
T-shirt in soft cotton jersey with a print motif on the front.

Jumper in a soft, rib-knit wool blend with a V-neck front and back. Relaxed fit with dropped shoulders, long sleeves, ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem, and slits in the sides. Slightly longer at the back.
Leggings in soft organic cotton jersey with an elasticated waist.
